alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTY THROUGH 830 PM MDT... At 800 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Ellsworth, or 30 miles northeast of Alliance, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Watson Lake, Diamond Lake, Billys Lake, Wolf Hill, Kennedy Lake, Smith Lake State Wildlife Management Area, and Argo Hill. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 9 and 33. Highway 2 near mile marker 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
